spec_data.Name: allegro5-addon-acodec
spec_data.Description:
This package provides the audio codec addon for the Allegro 5 library.
This addon allows you to load audio sample formats.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 04:28:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Audio codec addon for the Allegro 5 library
